sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../../models/movie'; import { MoviesService } from '../../services/movies.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-movies', templateUrl: './movies.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movies.component.scss'] }) export class MoviesComponent implements OnInit { movies: Movie[] = []; constructor(private moviesService: MoviesService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} getPageMovies(page: number) { this.moviesService.searchMovies(5).subscribe((movies) => { this.movies = movies; }); } paginate(event: any) { console.log(event); } }
